item.title: Mastering owned entities in EF Core: Cleaner complex types
item.description: Not all data in your application should live as a standalone table with its own ID and lifecycle. Sometimes you need a tightly coupled dependent object that exists alongside its parent, like a movie's budget, a survey's questions, or a customer's address. If you Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/mastering-owned-entities-in-ef-core-cleaner-complex-types/

item.title: Fetching GitHub content from C#
item.description: One of the many advantages of storing project assets on GitHub is that you can access them both manually and programmatically from anywhere. At elmah.io, we are using this for documentation, code snippets, and more. Instead of placing documents across multiple systems, we version them right alongside the code Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/fetching-github-content-from-c/
